    Class used to create a random maze.

    • Method Detail

      • buildMaze

        public char[][] buildMaze(int size)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a random maze of the given size.

        Starting from the cell in front of the exit go to a random adjacent cell. Save the cells on a stack.

        When there are no available adjacent cells pop from the stack until there are.

        Specified by:
        buildMaze in interface gamelogic.IMazeBuilder
        Parameters:
        size - size of the maze to create
        Returns:
        maze
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • checkWalls

        public boolean checkWalls(char[][] maze)
        Check if there are 3x3 walls on the maze.
        Parameters:
        maze - maze to check
        Returns:
        true if yes. false if not.

      • chooseNextPos

                                  Point pos)
        Return the next point randomly.
        Parameters:
        maze - maze to get next position to
        pos - starting point, from which the next one will be calculated
        Returns:
        next poin
